name: Unfallfieber
description:
In this video game you are the world famous racing driver Locke. With the help of your super high tech racing car, you are unbeatable! The only problem: your crush only dates losers ...

Fight against your will to win and try to hit as many obstacles as possible!

Beautiful women love losers, be one of them.

____________________

Controls: 

Trigger A & D or Arrow Keys LEFT & RIGHT to move your car

R to replace the car in the middle of the track

ESC to go back to main menu

____________________

Enjoy!
